Please update the following program based on this instruction: add import numpy as np to your code

Current program:
from vpython import *

# Define and initialize the Radius_I variable
Radius_I = 1

# Parameter settings
size = 0.5
L = 10.0
v = Radius_I
t = 0
dt = 0.01

# Screen setup
scene = canvas(title="Uniform Linear Motion", width=800, height=300, x=0, y=0,
               center=vec(0, 0, 0), background=vec(0.5, 0.5, 0))
cube = box(pos=vec(-0.5*L, 0, 0), size=vec(size, size, size), color=color.red)
floor = box(pos=vec(0, -0.5*size, 0), size=vec(L, 0.01, 3), color=color.green)

gd = graph(title="x-t curve", x=0, y=300, width=400, height=200,
           xtitle="t", ytitle="x", ymax=10, xmax=10, xmin=0, ymin=-10)
xt = gcurve(graph=gd, color=color.red)

gd2 = graph(title="v-t curve", x=400, y=300, width=400, height=200,
            xtitle="t", ytitle="v", ymax=10, xmax=10, xmin=0, ymin=-10)
vt = gcurve(graph=gd2, color=color.red)

# Object movement
while cube.pos.x <= 0.5*L - 0.5*size:
    rate(1000)
    cube.pos.x += v*dt
    xt.plot(pos=(t, cube.pos.x))
    vt.plot(pos=(t, v))
    t += dt
output:
import numpy as np
from vpython import *

# Define and initialize the Radius_I variable
Radius_I = 1

# Parameter settings
size = 0.5
L = 10.0
v = Radius_I
t = 0
dt = 0.01

# Screen setup
scene = canvas(title="Uniform Linear Motion", width=800, height=300, x=0, y=0,
               center=vec(0, 0, 0), background=vec(0.5, 0.5, 0))
cube = box(pos=vec(-0.5*L, 0, 0), size=vec(size, size, size), color=color.red)
floor = box(pos=vec(0, -0.5*size, 0), size=vec(L, 0.01, 3), color=color.green)

gd = graph(title="x-t curve", x=0, y=300, width=400, height=200,
           xtitle="t", ytitle="x", ymax=10, xmax=10, xmin=0, ymin=-10)
xt = gcurve(graph=gd, color=color.red)

gd2 = graph(title="v-t curve", x=400, y=300, width=400, height=200,
            xtitle="t", ytitle="v", ymax=10, xmax=10, xmin=0, ymin=-10)
vt = gcurve(graph=gd2, color=color.red)

# Object movement
while cube.pos.x <= 0.5*L - 0.5*size:
    rate(1000)
    cube.pos.x += v*dt
    xt.plot(pos=(t, cube.pos.x))
    vt.plot(pos=(t, v))
    t += dt
